document_title: Deviated nasal septum: Causes, signs and treatments
subsection_name: lech-vach-ngan-mui.json_1_Where is the nasal septum located?
subsection_content: The nasal septum is a part of the nasal structure located in the nasal cavity, dividing the two nasal cavities. The nasal septum is composed of cartilage and bone, about 8cm long starting from the tip of the nose to the nasopharynx.
subsection_title: lech vach ngan mui.json. Where is the nasal septum located?
subsection_data:
lech vach ngan mui.json. Where is the nasal septum located?
The nasal septum is a part of the nasal structure located in the nasal cavity, dividing the two nasal cavities. The nasal septum is composed of cartilage and bone, about 8cm long starting from the tip of the nose to the nasopharynx.
